name: Razor Sharp
description:
Have you been beardless for too long? Are you jealous of people with mustaches? Fear not! Your time has come! Smack down mustaches with your axe and collect presents! Endless game (unless you die). Who can get the highest score?

This project will no longer be worked on but will be kept on itch as a memory of my very first project. Sure it has bugs and the gameplay isn't that interesting but it's a project that I managed to complete which I am proud of .

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for #Krassjam November 2017

This game was made within less than 72 hours during a game jam and is super buggy, has missing features and can be optimized way more. Just a fun little project :)
